website_summaries.verdict: A superb car radio antenna that is simple to install in a wide range of vehicles.
pros: Includes a rubber gasket that ensures watertight mounting
Heavy-duty design guarantees the antenna is built to withstand even the harshest weather conditions
Compact antenna is a wonderful choice for vehicles big and small
cons: Delivers minimal reception in some areas
More expensive than many comparable antennas

customer_reviews.title: Folds back at highway speeds. Issue fixed, Under cover there is a tension screw.
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, Just a bit better reception from my hidden antenna motorcycle radio. What I hate? if I go any where near 70MPH it folds back. it wont stay at the angle I set it. I may try to take it apart to see if there is anything I can tighten. Update, the upper cover comes off and there is a tension screw you can tighten. Issue fixed. This is not in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: pedro cardona

customer_reviews.title: This antenna was a perfect it or my vehicle
customer_reviews.text: This antenna was a perfect it or my vehicle. Thanks or having the correct product on hand to satisfy my needs. I now have AM/FM radio reception. I found that the original antenna was power activated and the dealer was the only place that had the antenna, but the cost out weighed my decision to buy the antenna, so again thank you very much for being their to help. Great service, shipping, and product inventory.
customer_reviews.author: snoopy99

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: What I did not realize when installing it, that the bolt screw on it is not that long. Put it on a pontoon boat console that is fiberglass and is thicker compared to auto body sheet metal. Had trouble getting the nut attached to hold the base on. That was on me. Not sure if it stated the minimum-maximum thickness the base would work on, when I ordered it. All in all it's mounted, and works OK.
customer_reviews.author: Ken 2

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing... so simple!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried but am very happy now that I spent 5 min installing on a bare metal body panel. Just drill your hole and you are mostly done. I searched the entire internet and this is the only antenna like this I could find.
customer_reviews.author: FishOnTheLine

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased one of those stick on antenna's and my radio would not pick up anything and it was actually shutting the radio off because of no signal. Trust me !! I installed this antenna and it changed everything, the radio works fine, the reception is great and it was very easy to install not to mention the difference in quality between the two antenna's. if I ever needed an antenna going forward this would be the one I would select.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Fair reception at camp in mountains
customer_reviews.text: Install nicely where I needed a right angle mount, but reception is spotty. I guess you get what you pay for. I use this at camp in my boat to be fair... use in urban areas is likely much better
customer_reviews.author: Diane S

customer_reviews.title: Great little antenna
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pair of these little antennas to mount on either side of my Peterbilt 330 cab. I had to relocate the radio antenna because a rig mast would otherwise hit it. From past experience with an International S Series truck with a single antenna mounted at the right front pillar of the cab windshield, I did not want to experience reception blocking of the radio signal by the structure of the truck cab. I have these antenna mounted one each side of the cab. They are short enough that they won't be hit by objects overhead but will still capture the broadcast single no matter which way the truck is facing.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: It works just like the original (which I accidentally cut when installing it). It is a factory duplicate with the same-same part number. Easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Mustang Gregg

customer_reviews.title: nice antenea
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect for my silverwing, its small out of the way, can be angled to sit just right and works well with my stereo setup on the bike
customer_reviews.author: rowlingstone

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and compact, I painted the chrome black to blend in with my paint. It's barely visible and works awesomely!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hooper

customer_reviews.title: short all over
customer_reviews.text: antenna is very short , mount bolt is too short, coax is to short ! and after all that 1 station ! lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Did not have any reception with this product like no antenna at all
customer_reviews.author: Don Dearman

customer_reviews.title: Who knows
customer_reviews.text: Ehh didn’t work but not sure if it’s my fault or equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Shall

customer_reviews.title: great for tractor
customer_reviews.text: Works like we wanted, installed on Farmall 706 with year around cab, wanted any antenna that would be close to the can and not get broken.
customer_reviews.author: A Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great trailer antenna
customer_reviews.text: Awesome antenna, installed it on a snowmobile trailer and gets good reception, nice and small but still flexible and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Maynords76

customer_reviews.title: nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: works great, picking up stations that i couldn't get before.
customer_reviews.author: james owen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had it installed outside of our RV. We finally now have radio reception.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Great antenna for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Used with my new Jensen marine radio and the reception is phenomenal. Would highly recommend. Also, it is fairly small so keeps out of the way
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Antenna
customer_reviews.text: Great Antenna. Replaced the old metal motorized telescoping antenna mast on my 1985 Audi Coupe GT with little noticeable reception change. Easy replacement install. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Very happy with this purchase. Bought it for our boat. We get many more stations in Now. Big improvement.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Installed Jensen antenna on my 70 VW Bus. Stock ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed Jensen antenna on my 70 VW Bus. Stock antenna is old school metal telescoping type. So the Jensen provides minimalist custom sano look I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Unless your radio has great signal amplification this Antenna is useless, live in Chicago get about half to a quarter the stations I get with a different antenna on the same equipment at the same location. Not even AM Stations that I usually get from here to Indianapolis, I cant get it at my house. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Petrus

customer_reviews.title: Antenna doesn’t delivery the reception needed.
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again! The antenna did not do the job. After installing this antenna on a new Jensen waterproof radio, reception was very poor. I did like the size and workmanship of the antenna but it just didn’t do the job. Went to my local autozone and bought their 10.00 antenna and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R

customer_reviews.title: Whipped tunes
customer_reviews.text: Great fit , excellent reception , and I didn't have to make modifications to the bike .
customer_reviews.author: Ronald  Mc Rae

product_meta.title: Jensen JAN139 6" Heavy-Duty Universal Top/Side-Mount Rubber Mast Antenna
product_meta.description: Attached 39" cable 6" rubber mast top/side-mount antenna rubber gasket for watertight mounting JENSEN 6" heavy-duty universal top/side-mount rubber mast antenna JAN139 ="antenna 6" universal".
feature_bullets: Withstands tough environments with its heavy-duty design
